message: Let's make a deal. I take $70, you take $30. It's a good offer for you to start with.
Let's be reasonable, Alice. I'm offering you $40, a fair deal considering the inflation.
Bob, my friend, time is money!  Let's settle this now. I'm taking a small hit with $65, you get $35. Deal?
The clock is ticking, Alice. I'll take the majority this time, 65/35. Don't let this opportunity slip away!
Bob, we're running out of time! This offer is more than fair, and it benefits us both to take it before inflation eats away at our potential gains.
